description:
By chaining four 75W panels together, Goal Zero creates a serous solar power solution for high-use situations. Made with an EFTE polymer instead of glass, the Ranger adds 100 Watts of power over the Boulder 200 while reducing weight by over 1kg. Attach your Goal Zero Yeti and harness the sun's energy to keep your electronics running.

  • Constructed from aluminum and ETFE polymer
  • Monocrystalline solar panels
  • Integrated kickstand helps optimize the angle
  • Waterproof design with easy folding hinges
  • 6ft. cable with blue (8mm male) solar plug: 14 - 23V, up to 21A (300W max)
  • Panel rated power of 300W
  • Panel open circuit voltage: 23V
  • Charges Goal Zero Yeti powerbank systems
  • Charge times range from 4 hours (Yeti 1000X) to 48 hours (Yeti 6000X)
  • Unfolded dimensions are 7.7 x 269.0 x 2.3cm
  • In the box: Ranger 300 Briefcase with cord and built-in kickstand, and protective canvas carrying bag
name: Goal Zero Ranger 300 Solar Panel
